label: 引倍木
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Shiny, starched material made by stretching cloth on a waxed, lacquered board spread with paste.  The cloth was peeled off after the paste had dried (p. 548n).
